channel.title: [Runesource/Azure] RunePast [Official Release] Ask Anything
channel.description:
I quit Due to Temptation of other bases.
Download : http://dl.dropbox.com/u/29265393/RunePast%20v10.rar Client : 317 Deob :)
Features:
Added Slayer Fixed Thieving A shitty Music Player Fishing Herblore Fletching Quest Handler Lumby music ( You need a 317 deob with music ) Woodcutting Firemaking Crafting Stable A few Npc Spawns Dialogues Cooking Agility RuneCrafting Start Of smithing Mining Im not that good with features. i Quit this due to Alot of .. Projects unfinished. Working on the 508 now Then going back to 459
Some other Goodies...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3js8v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OdW5j.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/t5LK1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uUukc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MZg52.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Untitled-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Teleporting.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/mandia3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/mandia2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/mandia.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/hansdia3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/hansdia2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Hansdia.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/fletching.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/firemaking.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NGt9u.png[/img]

item.title: [Runesource/Azure] RunePast [Official Release] Ask Anything
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:29, topic:441134”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=543811.msg3998350#msg3998350 date=1337593298]

How come everyone on this damn site applauds for something that is so ‘amazing’ when in reality no one would play it. I base a release on if people would get into it & would it be successful. But who the fuck plays servers like this lol. I will never understand this shitty community

My goodness, why are you so fucking ignorant? It’s not about the ingame content that makes a server amazing. Judging sources by their potential to have players is stupid. DeltaScape is a base downloaded by thousands of people. Does that make it good? No. Do you actually have a clue about programming? Is it always the developers’ job to release a fully complete server that ten year olds can instantly download and play? No. If you don’t like this community, leave.
[/quote]
As judging by ur Rep What my brain tells me is that ur one of those leechers that want Everything to be in a source… why not go and Code and ull see how long it takes yeah… I currently Got 2 Leeching Species One Above and another who downloads a source and hosts.[/quote]

Shut up mezzy. Servers like this one have been released dozens of times. And rep? Rep means jack shit. For all we know you and someone else could have derepped him.

Read full topic

Is it always the developers’ job to release a fully complete server that ten year olds can instantly download and play? No. If you don’t like this community, leave.[/quote]
As judging by ur Rep What my brain tells me is that ur one of those leechers that want Everything to be in a source… why not go and Code and ull see how long it takes yeah… I currently Got 2 Leeching Species One Above and another who downloads a source and hosts.
